item.title: About this blog
item.description: Hello world, it’s me Matt. I’ve had this domain for the better part of a decade but haven’t regularly written in it. I’m hoping to create more content that can help support others growth. Whether it’s data science, meditation, startups, psychology, I probably won’t filter much. While I have written two books on machine learning, finished half of another and have been presenting for years I just haven’t made it a goal to blog much.
